name: SpaceShooterVR(Untitled)
description:
This game is currently in development. This build is the testing of the base movement mechanics. Join the discord for updates and support. https://discord.gg/UN9dwNqC

Supports: Rift/ Link and Quest/Quest2.

Controls:

Grab each joystick and move for movement. Left is movement and right is rotation.

Buttons on touch controllers are for up/down and roll.

Switch next to roll gauge switches controlls to the touch controller joysticks. If needed, large red button to the right side of cockpit resets view orientation. 

Download SpaceShooterWindows.zip for Rift/ Link

Unzip and run SpceShooter.exe

Download SpceShooter-arm64.zip for Quest/Quest2

Unzip and install .apk via sidequest.

This is an early development build and not all features are present/ working.
